category: Category of progress towards the implementation of the selected target
rate: Rate of progresses toward the implementation of the selected target
summary: Summary of the assessment of progresses toward the implementation of the selected target
anyOtherTools: Any other tools or means used for assessing progress
levelOfAboveAssessment: Level of confidence of the above assessment
adequacy: Adequacy of monitoring information to support assessment
noIndicators: The country has not used indicators to assess progress towards this national target.
linkToIndicator: Link to Indicator(s) used in this assessment
linkToActivity: Link to National Activity(ies) related to this assessment
